channel.title: Disable PVP From Same Ip!
channel.description:
Hey there, anyone can tell me how to disable same IP from attacking each other because I do not want people to be Cheating for kills and Starter.
I am on Delta, 317.
Thanks, Mighty Bean

item.title: Disable PVP From Same Ip!
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];

if (attackingOn2.connectedFrom == connectedFrom) {
return;
break;
resetAttack();
}
What ever Return type you want/need

Read full topic
